workshop.title: Oracle Identity Cloud Service
workshop.description: Get familiar with features and capabilities of Oracle Identity Cloud Service - next generation Enterprise Identity and Access management solution on cloud and on-premise

versions.name: Instructor Led
versions.description: An in-person workshop with an Oracle instructor

labs.title: Lab 1: User on-boarding
labs.description: Lab to explore various ways of on-boarding users in your organization to IDCS

labs.title: Lab 2:  SSO
labs.description: Lab to integrate third-party apps using various supported single sign-on (SSO) methods - SAML, Secure Form-Fill

labs.title: Lab 3:  MFA
labs.description: Lab to explore multi-factor authentication capabilities

labs.title: Lab 4: Self-Registration
labs.description: Lab to explore self-registration scenario for external B2C users
